title: Executive Order 7044-Revocation of Executive Order No. 7004, of April 10, 1935, Changing Location of the Land Office for the Linkton Land District
content: Executive Order No. 7004, of April 10, 1935, changing the location of the land office for the Linkton land district in the State of Oregon from Lakeview to Klamath Falls, is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7044-Revocation of Executive Order No. 7004, of April 10, 1935, Changing Location of the Land Office for the Linkton Land District Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/376109
